website_summaries.verdict: Excellent sound and iPhone syncing wrapped in a clock radio that may have too few features for its price point.
pros: Very good sound for a clock radio
Clock’s LED light can be dimmed manually
Syncs with docked iPhone to match time and date
Few options, making clock radio and alarm easier to program
cons: Dock is only compatible with iPhones
Phone cases can interfere with docking

customer_reviews.title: Good radio, poor dock
customer_reviews.text: As a clock radio, it has many fine features and works quite well. However, as others have mentioned, it does not allow you to charge your phone without removing the case. I've tried several cases and none will work. Unless your case is really a screen protector only, the top-mounted dock will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: My husband has very much enjoyed this clock radio
customer_reviews.text: My husband has very much enjoyed this clock radio. It even works well with his phone case on. Don't buy one of the adapters until you give this a try and confirm you need an adapter to make the charger work with your case. I had one of the older models that didn't work at all with a case. iHome did a good job of adapting to customer needs.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: No longer works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clock radio December 17, 2018, and last night, February 23, 2019, it no longer charges the phone, plays music or anything. It is now just a clock. My return window is also closed. I do not recommend buying this. I've had other iHome clock radios that lasted years. Two months? Now, I'm on the hunt for another one. I think I'll buy it from Walmart this time. If it should stop working again, I'll be able to at least return it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: This product should work better for the money that is charged for it
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well, for 30 days, now the charging utilization plug longer recognizes my phone, and it's one day past the replacement window. I will update my review if the seller is willing to do something about this. This product should work better for the money that is charged for it. As a note, I am not using a case with the phone when charging it just so it is clear that having a case on the phone is not the issue, it just flat out doesn't charge the phone like it for the first month.
customer_reviews.author: jdiferdi

customer_reviews.title: Was great if it worked longer....
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a product like this for a while that is compatible with the newer apple products. It worked amazing when I got it and I was very excited. Unfortunately, it promptly stopped working days later. It will no longer charge my iPhone(7)or play music from it. Unless I use a separate lightening cord, which I fact does defeat the purpose of a dock. I don't often write reviews or return things. This will be my first and saddest product goodbye. Also if wow are thinking of purchasing this you need a thin phone case. Otter box will not fit something a lil smaller will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kapri Locke

customer_reviews.title: Simple alarm clock radio and charging device that works great
customer_reviews.text: Just a great simple radio alarm clock that charges the iPhone, exactly what I was looking for. This product is simple to use and easy to setup. So many others have all these useless features you will never use, terrible directions and so forth. If you are looking a for a simple easy to install and use alarm clock radio that charges this is great. Has the built in charging dock for the iPhone and an additional USB input to charge something else. Perfect. Easy to use to set up alarms with the product or your iPhone which I like. The button for dimming the display is great, lots of options on brightness to completely dark.
customer_reviews.author: John DW

customer_reviews.title: Good size, sound and function for a bed stand clock radio.
customer_reviews.text: This IHome clock radio with IPhone, IPod charging dock worked well straight out of the box. The instructions were easy to understand. The clock came out of the box set to the correct time, requiring no adjustment. Time changed to Daylight Savings recently, and the clock adjusted automatically. The dock accepts my IPhone and IPod and is easy to operate. All functions of the phone and IPod are available on the IHome clock radio. The light and size of the digits on the clock make it easy to read in daylight, darkness, and the dim light of dusk and dawn. The product is packaged well with all necessary attachments included in the box. Overall, I'm delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Could be less
customer_reviews.text: I like that it isn't big. It doubles for me as a speaker because its loud. The light doesn't bother me and I use it as a night light. It would be ideal to have more than one alarm setting especially for the price I paid. My husband and I wake up at different times. I have to change the time every day that it became annoying so I left it at one set time. You can go cheaper and have more alarm settings elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MeluvAmzn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but don't like how it works
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. Nice features for the most part although I don't like how the snooze works (my old alarm clock would give you double/triple/more time if you hit the snooze more than once...this one doesn't do that). I also don't like the button layout. It's hard to find the alarm reset in the dark. I don't hate it but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pengwinn

customer_reviews.title: Great little alarm clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this alarm clock! It fits my iphone 8 perfectly, even with my case on. I can set my alarm to play a song instead of the horrible buzzer of traditional alarm clocks. It gets great radio reception, which you can also set to your alarm. I like the display dimmer feature. We had a power outage and the clock kept the time and alarm settings! All around, this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Good as a charging station/amplifier.
customer_reviews.text: Several uses: Charges, Displays, secondary USB port, AC/ or battery operated, alarm clock, several brightness settings for the LED clock. It's compact, & versatile. I bought it for the speakers. I also like that it "stands" my i-phone while charging. (I bought one for each room) The ONLY improvements I can imagine would be its own solar charger and a port for a thumb drive.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J.

customer_reviews.title: A complicated device with alarm
customer_reviews.text: It seemed a lot like the ihome alarm clock with Alexa, but you have to call the manufacturer because it doesn’t say by the manual how to put it together or what the buttons mean, so it was complicated and i still didn’t know how to work it so I just wanted to get a refund on it
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient! The display even dimmed casts a rather strong glow so I would not place right next to your face on a night table, but it works perfectly. I have a wrap around cover on my iphone and it did not fit with the cover on. Also slightly tricky to connect the phone, but nothing wildly difficult. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: RobertaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose clock
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these. They make it easy to set up charging stations. The brightness of the clock can be controlled with multiple clicks of a button. It can be bright in the morning and nonexistent at night which is my preference. I don’t want the light pollution. I do take off the case to my phone to charge it but my son does not. The only downside is that the string antenna needs something to wrap around to get a good signal.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Takes some figuring to learn how it all works. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Takes some figuring to understand how the alarm works when using phone to charge. Like the several levels of light dimming. Good product just takes some time to understand how it all works.
customer_reviews.author: beckytalk

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the charging function.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the charging function. Apparently, it has decided that it will only charge if the phone is not locked... I also dislike that I have to remove my case which is a tech 21 in order for it to fit the charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Clock Radio
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need it to. My 10 year old daughter uses it and loves to wake up each morning to her favorite songs. She does have a slim case on her iPhone and it doesn't interfere with docking at all, but I can see how a thicker case might cause trouble.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mckee

customer_reviews.title: You need a lighting extender for any case
customer_reviews.text: my issue with the product is that it will not work with normal cases and the description is not clear. So you now have to spend an extra $10+. They really should have that adapter included at this price level. The product beauty shot shows all the idevices that it can charge which I assumed would be through the connector on top. This was a gift and I was disappointed and embarrassed since they cant use it. Now I have to play guessing game at which extender will fit and work.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kolakowski

customer_reviews.title: Love having this
customer_reviews.text: We love having this ipod player. It can be kind of pain if you have an otterbox case, but I usually just take the outer shell off and it fits fine. Great place to charge phone and sounds amazing when playing music. Multiple brightness settings for the clock display.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Two charging ability
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool because it have a port as well as the dock so i can charge two things at once plus you can make the brightness what ever you want the sound is really good as well
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: very happy!
customer_reviews.text: my last one lasted 6 years with out a hitch till a power serge took it. I was so happy with it I bought this one cause i cant fall to sleep or wake up with out it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works with my iPhone 8 with no issues; with or without the protective cover I have on the phone. The backlight is quite bright and even the lowest setting could be "softer" but if I need to, I can turn it off altogether.
customer_reviews.author: David Z.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Keep
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this was just the ihome I received or what, but for some reason the sound quality did not work for me. I would put my iPod on the dock and the quality would be fine for a few minutes, but then a static sound would interfere. Every time I thought I had the problem fixed, it would mess up again. I had to return the product, but I used my refund to buy a different version ihome and that one works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KPVK

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Radio
customer_reviews.text: We like this radio so much that we have 2 of them in 2 residences! Its small and nicely designed and it also charges my iPhone AND my iPad at the same time. So compact and convenient!
customer_reviews.author: T Cat

customer_reviews.title: iHome Clock/Radio/iPhone Charger
customer_reviews.text: iHome device works as an alarm clock, radio and an iPhone charger. The clock automatically sets the correct time. Has an optional 9 volt battery backup in the event of power failures.
customer_reviews.author: docjnsuss

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item in December and I was very disappointed that the product was such poor quality it didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was working well for the first month but shortly after purchase the dock stopped syncing with my iPhone. I purchased this item in December and I was very disappointed that the product was such poor quality it didn't make it past the first month of use. The product is advertised to match the sizing of all cases and yet, my small case wouldn't work with it. I am overall very unimpressed with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have enough contrast for me
customer_reviews.text: The display doesn't have enough contrast for me. You can see the time at a certain angle. Even the dimmest is still too bright at night. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: SYM

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in early 2018. I have been happy with the product. It has a decent sound and display plus I can preset a number of radio stations. I like that I can dock my iPhone on it for charging or playing music. I don't use the alarm clock very often, but when I do I find the process cumbersome enough that I have to refer to the instruction booklet. If I used the alarm every day maybe I would remember better how it's done. For this one reason I give this product 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer N

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ihome system and I have mixed feelings. The first was great (different model) but I bought this one for my new iphone. The alarm works and it charges my phone but the music will stop playing randomly. I'm not sure if its the ihome or my phone that stops though but it only happens when I use this ihome.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Product not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product is falsely advertised. Picture shows 2nd device being charged by USB cable and text says it has a USB port but the product has no USB port. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I love the charging station but that is kind of annoying ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Speck case and my case would not fit on the charging dock with my phone. I have to take my case off every time I want to charge my phone. I love the charging station but that is kind of annoying having to take off my case every time.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: You need a very thin case to use the charger ...
customer_reviews.text: You need a very thin case to use the charger. Adapters on the charger does not work or work very well. I have already went through two adapters that broke.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Looney

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT clock, easy to use & it charges your phone (or iPod or other device) while you sleep!! Bought for my "technology challenged" husband as a Christmas gift and he just loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I've Had to Replace Too Many of These
customer_reviews.text: I've bought more than one of this item, but ultimately it's the same problem. The connector you plug your phone into eventually stops working, meaning the phone can't charge or play music through the speakers. When it works, this is a great device, but my newest one was just purchased in November of 2019, as a replacement for one that had the same problem. By early April 2020, it's not working.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Love the extra USB so I can charge my iPad ...
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I was looking for: small footprint and seamless integration with my iPhone. Love the extra USB so I can charge my iPad bedside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob E.

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t work with the iHome app!! seriously?!?!
customer_reviews.text: i am extremely bummed to find that it doesn’t work withe the iHome app! i wish it would have been more obvious in the description. the buttons don’t even light up, so you can’t set the alarm without turning on a light
customer_reviews.author: jujubiiz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good iHome and I'm still enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good iHome and I'm still enjoying it. It looks nice as well and operates a bit above expectations. However, the Ankey extender (now unavailable from Amazon) was horrendous. It got bent after the 2nd time using and completely broke off into the phone after about the 10th use.
customer_reviews.author: MRay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this clock/radio/charger to replace a previous one. It works wonderfully. I use it to charge my iPhone 7 while I listen to my music or stream through the clock/radio speaker. The volume is not as loud as I would like it to be but I still like it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LTW

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after the 30 day return window it became unable to play my iPod so now it’s a $50 clock.
customer_reviews.author: desert shopper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to install and use. My only complaint is that u have only one alarm, but I can live with it! My iphone 7 get changed on top, and the ipad down with a cable. Perfect ❣️
customer_reviews.author: lturk97

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the fit of the phone to the radio
customer_reviews.text: Our I phone 6 did not easily fit into the charging station. I had to remove the outer case before it would even come close to fitting. Too much trouble to take your case off before putting it in the charging station
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Parks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I was looking for. It works with iPhones and iPods. Great sound. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The clock seems to run fast.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter. It does its purpose, and it fairly easy to use once you decipher the instructions. The major issue is that it seems to run about a minute fast per month. Other than that, no issues with the product and I can recommend it conditionally.
customer_reviews.author: Alticaca

customer_reviews.title: Works greate
customer_reviews.text: I loved these so much I bought 10 more as gifts. I also have these placed in multiple rooms and they are perfect for the bedroom, kitchen or shop areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift. Recipient uses on a daily ...
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Recipient uses on a daily basis, and absolutely loves having this iPhone product. Zero wear on the connection peg or any other components in the 6 months they have owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This said that it's for 6/7/8/10 with a USB port. The one that I received is for 5/6 and no USB port. The product numbers are the same on the label, but the box says it's for 5/6 and iPod/iTouch. Highly disappointing and fraudulent marketing. Will be returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Has excellent volume and speakers
customer_reviews.text: If you have a case of any kind it won't fit. I rarely use the port now but I have an AUX cord hooked up to it. Has excellent volume and speakers. Quite pricey for the port not to be able to be used with a case on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Buy an extension For the plug in to extend it
customer_reviews.text: Good luck getting it to dock with a typical phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Bone Collector

customer_reviews.title: So wonderful to be able to wake
customer_reviews.text: The clock is exactly as advertised. Charges the iphone, plays music through the speakers, and the clock has a dimmer feature. So wonderful to be able to wake, the phone fully charged and not have to keep moving the charger all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: I love my little iHome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Ihome!!! Fits perfect on the place I put it and also has great sound. I can take it wherever I go and keeps me company on my multiple jobs. Pairs very nicely with the Bluetooth while charging with the aid of a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Garcia

customer_reviews.title: there was a great deal of static and station drift
customer_reviews.text: The sound was awful - even for a clock radio! Although the tuning is digital, there was a great deal of static and station drift. Try something else if you live in an area where reception is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eureka

customer_reviews.title: Too bright for sleeping and dimmer makes it hard to see time
customer_reviews.text: Like Small size for a night stand. Don’t like Clock lights up a dark room. Dimmer greys the the lit area but lights room. I turn off to sleep but the I can’t see what time it is whe turned off. Difficult to dock phone with one hand because the coupler has tension to spring tight against backdrop. Maybe didn’t use all the right descriptions but buy another model if this is for your night stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this alarm clock June 9,2019. As of last night the display light and buttons all stopped working. My phone and watch did not charge either. I would think this product should have lasted longer than 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Don arter

customer_reviews.title: Nice! buuuut can't plug phone into it unless the phone case is removed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an option for charging my phone at night, as the charging pads don't work with the phone case I have. The phone won't plug into this alarm clock, even with a thin phone case on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: RoyFamily

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with Case
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with the commuter otter box on, even after removing the rubber. This is one of the most popular phone cases for iPhones. To design a product that conflicts with it is not only foolish, but also irresponsible. Cases are not made to constantly be taken on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Tunes

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPhone 5
customer_reviews.text: I needed an iHome to work with my son's iPhone 5. It works great and I felt was a good deal. No problems/issues.
customer_reviews.author: jmskydiver

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my phone with an Otterbox case on it
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my phone with an Otterbox case on it. I also like that my husband can charge is phone at the same time by plugging into the USB port on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Best way to wake in the New Year
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife as she is a Medical Assistant and has to rise at 6:00am every morning she's working. We have been using a clock radio for years and can never get it to play music instead of advertising or some ridiculous DJ banter when we wake. This unit not only charges her phone and plays the last song she played on it for wake up, but the sound is incredible, the bass clear and soft, the treble distinct. The first time we had it wake us was the most pleasurable wake up call we've ever had. Set up is simple and operation easy. Such a great buy!! Starting our New Year off right.
customer_reviews.author: Bob A

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible
customer_reviews.text: Does not recognize my iPhone. It did for a second and now nothing. It's just a digital clock.
customer_reviews.author: Office Girl

customer_reviews.title: iHome Clock Radio
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect replacement for my old iHome clock radio. Easier to use and great sound. Replaced older version. This product worked great for 10 months now it stopped working DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! DO NOT BUY THIS iHome device
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: USB plug on back does not work to charge anything on any USB cord. Defeats the point.
customer_reviews.author: The King family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio sound and alarm.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up the time and radio stations. Alarm clock is very useful. Takes up little space and looks modern and sleek
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Acker-Missall

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Compact with good sound. I have a very thin iPhone case so I didn’t need an extender of any kind (bought some anticipating which are now a waste..) but I did have to take out the rubber band on the bottom. No complains.
customer_reviews.author: OCM.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much self explantary but a little tuff getting on and off charging port
customer_reviews.text: I'd say overall product does what it is expected to do, but it's a little tuff taking on and off the lightning charging port to the point where I would recommend getting an extender just to ensure that the included one doesn't accidently break.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: The sound is quite good for a small unit and it's nice that two ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is quite good for a small unit and it's nice that two devices can be charged. Very simple set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stypa

customer_reviews.title: Works for a while
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this clock for only 1 1/2 years and the docking station on top of the clock no longer works. Very disappointing. I had really liked this clock until recently.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sobocinski

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is functional but is very hard to plug in your phone, whitch is it’s main function for me. Also the alarm is not very loud and I have to use my phone’s alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Pelton4

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice, but doesn’t charge with the case on.
customer_reviews.text: Nice dock/clock, but my daughters phone doesn’t charge with the case on which is a huge bummer, but not a deal breaker. Her case is easy enough to take off and put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Heiman

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: This Radio is great I recommend everybody to buy one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for less than a year and the charger piece moves for easier access to get your phone on the charger, but it broke and now won’t charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: I listen to my radio in my office. It has been awesome so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Van Eycken

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Inaceptable, there was no USB port on the to charge the Apple Watch. This product is garbage
customer_reviews.author: That Guy #2

customer_reviews.title: Love the docking station component
customer_reviews.text: Love the docking station component. Radio is excellent quality as well. The only downfall - if there is one - is that I wish the clock would go even dimmer.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The model I was shipped (iPL23) does NOT have a USB port which is the whole reason I bought this product. BEYOND disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to charge phone on top (needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to charge phone on top (needed an extender to connect with case) and have extra USB port in back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hale

customer_reviews.title: A very good radio for the price
customer_reviews.text: A very good radio for the price. Better than average sound and good features. The only problem is the weak alarm sound unless you use the radio or Iphone alarms. Have to use a dock extender if you have a Otter case on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: " Docks with your case" Don't believe it! You ...
customer_reviews.text: " Docks with your case" Don't believe it! You will have to remove your iPhone case to charge your phone. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred G.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: False advertising it does not have the USB plug like it shows on here.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Ivy

customer_reviews.title: the machine worked for only 2 months and than broke
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my granddaughter for Christmas. within 2 months of her receiving this gift , it was broken and could not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked it when I got it but it only worked for about six weeks
customer_reviews.author: Karen Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Missing variable alarm settings like a 5 day and 7 day setting
customer_reviews.text: The radio was missing some features that you would expect in a radio at this price. Sound quality was below average. Missing variable alarm settings like a 5 day and 7 day setting. I probably won’t purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as advertised! Product labels and numbers match as to having USB port, but NO USB port when received. Total fraud.
customer_reviews.author: doug Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only thing is that the power button is a little sensitive but everything else rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Press

customer_reviews.title: Will not dock with a case
customer_reviews.text: Will not dock with an iphone 7 if you have a case on it. Specifically an otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal Chee

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, it works very well and very loud. he loves it! great alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: TDailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got for the wifey. After her alarm clock died. She loves it!!! Talks about it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cooney

customer_reviews.title: ... my hubby as a birthday gift but he did like it!
customer_reviews.text: Got that for my hubby as a birthday gift but he did like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not big, so it fits anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this IHome. The sound is great, it charges fast.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Gavioli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: happy with it. wished it were easier to dock, though.
customer_reviews.author: PMDJR

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast

customer_reviews.title: i bought 5 of these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these as a bedroom clock for a beach rental. I liked it so much I bought 4 more for our house. I like that the clock light adjusts from bright to nothing- I hate clock light when Im trying to sleep!!

customer_reviews.title: No matter how I try to use the directions, ...
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I try to use the directions, I can not get the alarm to go off! Also, my IPhone 6 sync unless I take my case off every night and I refuse to do that. The only thing I can really use it for is the time and plugging my phone into the back of it to charge it every night!

product_meta.title: iHome iPL23V2BX Alarm Clock FM Radio with Lightning iPhone Charging Dock Station for iPhone Xs, XS Max, XR, X, iPhone8,7,6 Plus USB Port to Charge Any USB Device
product_meta.description: Color:Black-Lightning Dock W/USB ChargerThe iPL23V2 is a great looking, space-saving speaker system for listening to all your music. Lightning connecter to charge and play iPhone and iPod. Wake or sleep to your favorite iPhone or iPod tunes or FM radio stations through high fi delity drivers in a specially designed Reson8 speaker chamber. Auto sync feature instantly sets clock to iPhone or iPod time. 1 Amp USB port to charge mobile devices This product works with the iPhone 7 and 8 as well. These iPhones work with lightning ports.
feature_bullets: Flexible Lightning connector plays and charges Lightning-capable iPhone/iPod models
1 Amp USB charging port to charge iPad/iWatch or Any USB Device
Sleep to FM radio, iPhone or iPod with auto-shutoff,Wake or sleep to iPhone/iPod/FM/buzzer
Auto Sync instantly sets clock to iPhone time,Reson8 technology for great sound
FM radio with 6 presets,Display dimmer control
